short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fullmetal Alchemist wallpaper turn new tab to HD Fullmetal Alchemist background. Fullmetal Alchemist theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Rotate through various Fullmetal Alchemist wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Customize your background from the Fullmetal Alchemist collection or pin your favorite for quick access.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New note feature for jotting down your daily tasks.
7. Streamlined access to frequently visited websites.
8. Quick link to your bookmarked pages.
9. Add frequently visited sites to the Shortcut panel for faster access.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Explore additional themes easily.
12. Simplified sharing to social media networks.
13. Immediate access to download new wallpapers.
14. One-click entry to gaming portals.
15. Activate interactive effects like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Fullmetal Alchemist new tab.
